critique: The document is a formal executive order imposing economic sanctions on Haiti. It expresses a sense of seriousness and determination to address a national emergency. There is a sense of disgust and anger towards the actions of the de facto regime in Haiti, which prompts the order. There is also a sense of sadness towards the suffering of the Haitian people, which the order attempts to alleviate through humanitarian aid exceptions. There is no explicit expression of joy or surprise.
